original: sred pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: craving is not attached,

original: len pa'ang chags pa med do //🔽srid pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: len pa'ang chags pa med do // srid pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: grasping is not attached,🔽becoming is not attached,

original: skye ba'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba'ang chags pa med do //
translated: birth is not attached,

original: rga shi'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi'ang chags pa med do //
translated: aging and death is not attached.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The perfection of giving is not attached,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of morality is not attached,🔽the perfection of patience is not attached,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of effort is not attached,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of concentration is not attached,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do // nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not attached.🔽Inner emptiness is not attached,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: outer emptiness is not attached,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness is not attached,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is not attached,

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the great is also not attached.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is also not attached.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is also not attached.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags @111a *//🔽pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags @111a *// pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is also not attached.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is also not attached.🔽The emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination is also not attached.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is also not attached.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of nature is also not attached.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also not attached.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is also not attached.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also not attached.🔽The emptiness of non-entities is also not attached.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also not attached.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of entities is also without attachment.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also without attachment.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The right efforts are also without attachment.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //🔽dbang po rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do // dbang po rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are also without attachment.🔽The faculties are also without attachment.

original: stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The powers are also without attachment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment are also without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The noble eightfold path is also without attachment.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The noble truths are also without attachment.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities are also without attachment.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The immeasurable practices are also without attachment.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The formless meditative stabilizations are also without attachment.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The liberations are also without attachment.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: the formless absorptions are not fettered and not unfettered.🔽The emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: rnam par @111b thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par @111b thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness meditative stabilization, the signless meditative stabilization, and the wishless meditative stabilization are not fettered by attachment and not unfettered by detachment.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa med do // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The five eyes are not fettered and not unfettered.🔽The six superknowledges are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The ten powers of the Tathāgata are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa med do // byams pa chen po'ang chags pa med do //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are not fettered and not unfettered.🔽Great love is not fettered and not unfettered.

original: snying rje chen po'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'ang chags pa med do //
translated: Great compassion is not fettered and not unfettered.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not fettered and not unfettered.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is not fettered and not unfettered.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: The path is also unattached.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa med do //
translated: Omniscience is also unattached.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti said, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: khyod kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'di skad du /
translated: you say, ‘Venerable Subhūti,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: the mind of omniscience is also uncontaminated and does not fall into any category.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: der yang ma zad de /🔽byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: der yang ma zad de / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: it is not only that.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The minds of foolish ordinary beings are also uncontaminated and do not fall into any category because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: The minds of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas and the minds of the lord buddhas are also uncontaminated and do not fall into any category because their nature is emptiness.”

original: de yin te /
analyzed: de yin te /
translated: Subhūti said, “That is so, Śāriputra, that is so.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: The Venerable Śāradvatīputra

original: byis pa so so'i skye bo @112a *//🔽rnams kyis sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo @112a *// rnams kyis sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The minds of foolish ordinary beings

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: are also uncontaminated and not included, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The minds of the hearers

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: are also uncontaminated and not included, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The minds of the solitary buddhas

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: are also uncontaminated and not included, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.🔽The minds of the blessed buddhas

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: are also uncontaminated and not included, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /🔽de lta yin na gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor / de lta yin na gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: He said, “Venerable Subhūti,🔽if that is so, then form

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is also uncontaminated and not included, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Feelings are also empty of inherent nature.🔽

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // 'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Feeling is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Perception is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Volitional factors are also without outflows and are not included in the three realms, because they are empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Consciousness is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rna ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rna ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The eyes are also without outflows and are not included in the three realms, because they are empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sna'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sna'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The ears are also without outflows and are not included in the three realms, because they are empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The nose is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: lce'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: lce'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The tongue is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because it is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs @112b su chud pa med do //🔽lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs @112b su chud pa med do // lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: It is not defiled and is not included.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The body is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The mind is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sgra'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sgra'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Form is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽dri'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // dri'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Sound is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽ro'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // ro'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Smell is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Taste is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: Touch is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And phenomena are empty by nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And the Dharma is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: Eye consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Ear consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Nose consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Tongue consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: Body consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Mind consciousness is also without outflows and not included in the aggregates, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag @113a *// pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag @113a *// pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: It is not defiled and is not included.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the contact that is the coming together of the eye is empty by nature,

analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: it is not defiled and is not included.

analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: it is not defiled and is not included.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the contact that is the coming together of the nose is empty by nature,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: it is not defiled and is not included.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the contact that is the coming together of the tongue is empty by nature,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: it is not defiled and is not included.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the contact that is the coming together of the body is empty by nature,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: it is not defiled and is not included.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the contact that is the coming together of the mind is empty by nature,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
