original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sred pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sred pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Sensation is also not defiled and not purified, because sensation is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽len pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // len pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Craving is also not defiled and not purified, because craving is empty of inherent nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: Clinging is also not defiled and not purified, because clinging is empty of inherent nature.🔽Existence is also not defiled and not purified, because existence is empty of inherent nature.🔽Birth is also not defiled and not purified, because birth is empty of inherent nature.🔽Aging and death are also not defiled and not purified, because aging and death are empty of inherent nature.

original: srid pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: srid pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Existence also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is not defiled and is not purified.

original: skye ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: skye ba'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Birth also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is not defiled and is not purified.

original: rga shi'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rga shi'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Aging and death also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: are not defiled and are not purified.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of giving also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is not defiled and is not purified.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of morality also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is not defiled and is not purified.

original: @118b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: @118b bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of patience also, because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: is not defiled and is not purified.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of perseverance is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of concentration is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Inner emptiness is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Outer emptiness is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is also without outflows and is not included in the three realms, because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The great emptiness is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of ultimate reality is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the compounded is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @119a *//🔽nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @119a *// nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of the uncompounded is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The emptiness of what transcends limits is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The emptiness of non-discernible minima is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The emptiness of non-repudiation is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The emptiness of specific characteristics is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is also not defiled and is not purified, because it is empty of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is also not defiled and is not purified, because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are also not defiled and are not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid @119b kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid @119b kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The right efforts are also not defiled and are not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The bases of supernatural power are also not defiled and are not purified, because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: They are not defiled and are not included.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The faculties are also not defiled and are not included, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The powers are also not defiled and are not included, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The branches of enlightenment are also not defiled and are not included, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The noble eightfold path is also not defiled and is not included, because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The noble truths are also not defiled and are not included, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities are also not defiled and are not included, because their nature is emptiness.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The immeasurables are also empty of their own nature.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The immeasurables are also not defiled and are not included because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The formless absorptions are also not defiled and are not included because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The liberations are also not defiled and are not included because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽@120a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // @120a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The serial absorptions are also not defiled and are not included because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are also not defiled and are not included because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The superknowledges are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The meditative stabilizations are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do /🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The fearlessnesses are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are also without outflows and not included in the three realms, because their nature is emptiness.

original: byams pa chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /🔽zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽snying rje chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir / zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // snying rje chen po'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Great love is also without outflows and is not included because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Great compassion is also without outflows and is not included because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽thams cad shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // thams cad shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are also without outflows and are not included because their nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su @120b chud pa med do //🔽lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su @120b chud pa med do // lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Omniscience is also without outflows and is not included because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The knowledge of the aspects of the path is also without outflows and is not included because its nature is emptiness.

original: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
analyzed: zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is also without outflows and is not included because its nature is emptiness.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti replied, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du /
translated: you have said,

original: sems med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems med pa'i phyir /
translated: ‘because there is no mind,

original: sems de la'ang chags pa med do /
analyzed: sems de la'ang chags pa med do /
translated: that mind is also unattached.’

original: zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te /
analyzed: zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te /
translated: This is so.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: der yang ma zad de /
analyzed: der yang ma zad de /
translated: it is not only that.

original: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do // tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: Form is also unattached to form.🔽Feeling is also unattached to feeling.

original: 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med do //
translated: Perception is also unattached to perception.

original: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
translated: Formation is also unattached to formation.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Consciousness is also unattached to consciousness.

original: mig med pa'ang mig la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig med pa'ang mig la chags pa med do //
translated: The eyes are also unattached to the eyes.

original: rna ba med pa'ang rna ba la chags pa med do //🔽sna med pa'ang sna la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba med pa'ang rna ba la chags pa med do // sna med pa'ang sna la chags pa med do //
translated: The ears are also unattached to the ears.🔽The nose is also unattached to the nose.

original: lce med pa'ang lce la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce med pa'ang lce la chags pa med do //
translated: The tongue is also unattached to the tongue.

original: lus med pa'ang lus la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus med pa'ang lus la chags pa med do //
translated: The body is also unattached to the body.

original: yid med pa'ang yid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid med pa'ang yid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of mind is not attached to mind.

original: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of form is not attached to form.

original: sgra med pa'ang sgra la chags pa med do //🔽dri med pa'ang dri la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sgra med pa'ang sgra la chags pa med do // dri med pa'ang dri la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of sound is not attached to sound.🔽The absence of smell is not attached to smell.

original: ro med pa'ang ro la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ro med pa'ang ro la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of taste is not attached to taste.

original: reg med pa'ang reg la chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg med pa'ang reg la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of touch is not attached to touch.

original: chos med pa'ang chos la chags pa med do //🔽mig gi rnam par @121a *//
analyzed: chos med pa'ang chos la chags pa med do // mig gi rnam par @121a *//
translated: The absence of dharmas is not attached to dharmas.

original: shes pa med pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes pa med pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of eye consciousness is not attached to eye consciousness.🔽The absence of ear consciousness is not attached to ear consciousness.🔽The absence of nose consciousness is not attached to nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of tongue consciousness is not attached to tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of body consciousness is not attached to body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do // mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang /
translated: The nonexistence of the mind consciousness is not attachment to the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of eye contact is not attachment to eye contact.🔽The nonexistence of ear contact is not attachment to ear contact.🔽The nonexistence of nose contact is not attachment to nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of tongue contact is not attachment to tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of body contact is not attachment to body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of mind contact is not attachment to mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the feeling that arises from eye contact is not attachment to the feeling that arises from eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of ear, sound, and the consciousness of ear is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of ear, sound, and the consciousness of ear.

original: sna'i @121b 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i @121b 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of nose is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of body, touch, and the consciousness of body is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of body, touch, and the consciousness of body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of mind, phenomena, and the consciousness of mind is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of mind, phenomena, and the consciousness of mind.

original: sa'i khams med pa'ang sa'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams med pa'ang sa'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the earth element is not attached to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams med pa'ang chu'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams med pa'ang chu'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The water element, not existing, is not attached to the water element.

original: me'i khams med pa'ang me'i khams la chags pa med do //🔽rlung gi khams med pa'ang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams med pa'ang me'i khams la chags pa med do // rlung gi khams med pa'ang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The fire element, not existing, is not attached to the fire element.🔽The wind element, not existing, is not attached to the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The space element, not existing, is not attached to the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The consciousness element, not existing, is not attached to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa med pa'ang ma rig pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa med pa'ang ma rig pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Ignorance, not existing, is not attached to ignorance.

original: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
translated: Formations, not existing, are not attached to formations.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Consciousness, not existing, is not attached to consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs med pa'ang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med pa'ang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do //
translated: Name and form, not existing, are not attached to name and form.

original: skye mched drug med pa'ang skye mched drug la chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug med pa'ang skye mched drug la chags pa med do //
translated: The six sense sources, not existing, are not attached to the six sense sources.

original: reg pa med pa'ang reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa med pa'ang reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Contact, not existing, is not attached to contact.

original: tshor @122a *// ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor @122a *// ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of feeling is not attached to feeling.

original: sred pa med pa'ang sred pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa med pa'ang sred pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of craving is not attached to craving.

original: len pa med pa'ang len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: len pa med pa'ang len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of appropriation is not attached to appropriation.

original: srid pa med pa'ang srid pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa med pa'ang srid pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of existence is not attached to existence.

original: skye ba med pa'ang skye ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang skye ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of birth is not attached to birth.

original: rga shi med pa'ang rga shi la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi med pa'ang rga shi la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of old age and death is not attached to old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the perfection of generosity is not attached to the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the perfection of discipline is not attached to the perfection of discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the perfection of patience is not attached to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the perfection of diligence is not attached to the perfection of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is not attached to the perfection of meditative stability,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not attached to the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: inner emptiness is not attached to inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: outer emptiness is not attached to outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness is not attached to inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is not attached to the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med @122b do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med @122b do //
translated: great emptiness is not attached to great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality is not attached to the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned does not attach to the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned does not attach to the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits does not attach to the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless does not attach to the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded does not attach to the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence does not attach to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of all things does not attach to the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics does not exist, and the emptiness of defining characteristics is not attached.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist, and the emptiness of non-apprehension is not attached.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities does not exist, and the emptiness of non-entities is not attached.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature does not exist, and the emptiness of essential nature is not attached.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not exist, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is not attached.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la chags pa med @123a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la chags pa med @123a *//
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not exist, and the applications of mindfulness are not attached.

original: do // yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: do // yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The right efforts do not exist, and the right efforts are not attached.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The bases of psychic power do not cling to the bases of psychic power.

original: dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The faculties do not cling to the faculties.

original: stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The powers do not cling to the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The limbs of awakening do not cling to the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The path does not cling to the path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The noble truths do not cling to the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities do not cling to the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa rnams la la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa rnams la la chags pa med do //
translated: The immeasurables do not cling to the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The formless meditative stabilizations do not cling to the formless meditative stabilizations.

original: rnam par thar pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the liberations is not attached to the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang /
translated: The absence of the serial absorptions is not attached to the serial absorptions.🔽The emptiness gate of liberation is not attached to the emptiness gate of liberation.🔽The signless gate of liberation is not attached to the signless gate of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa @123b la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa @123b la chags pa med do //
translated: The wishless gate of liberation is not attached to the wishless gate of liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the higher knowledges is not attached to the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting de 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting de 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the meditative stabilizations is not attached to the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the dhāraṇī gateways is not attached to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the powers of the tathāgatas is not attached to the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of fearlessness is also not attached to the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the correct understandings is also not attached to the correct understandings.

original: byams pa chen po med pa'ang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do //
analyzed: byams pa chen po med pa'ang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of great love is also not attached to great love.

original: snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of great compassion is also not attached to great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the distinct attributes of a buddha is also not attached to the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of all aspects is also not attached to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of path aspects is also not attached to the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of all aspects is also not attached to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: He replied, “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so!

original: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do // tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: Form is not attached to form.🔽Feeling is not attached to feeling.

original: 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med do //
translated: Perception is not attached to perception.

original: 'du @124a *// byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du @124a *// byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
translated: Formation is not attached to formation.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Consciousness is not attached to consciousness.

original: mig med pa'ang mig la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig med pa'ang mig la chags pa med do //
translated: The eye is not attached to the eye.

original: rna ba med pa'ang rna ba la chags pa med do //🔽sna med pa'ang sna la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba med pa'ang rna ba la chags pa med do // sna med pa'ang sna la chags pa med do //
translated: The ear is not attached to the ear.🔽The nose is not attached to the nose.

original: lce med pa'ang lce la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce med pa'ang lce la chags pa med do //
translated: The tongue is not attached to the tongue.

original: lus med pa'ang lus la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus med pa'ang lus la chags pa med do //
translated: The body is not attached to the body.

original: yid med pa'ang yid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid med pa'ang yid la chags pa med do //
translated: The mind is not attached to the mind.

original: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do //
translated: Form is not attached to form.

original: sgra med pa'ang sgra la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sgra med pa'ang sgra la chags pa med do //
translated: Sound is not attached to sound.

original: dri med pa'ang dri la chags pa med do //🔽ro med pa'ang ro la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dri med pa'ang dri la chags pa med do // ro med pa'ang ro la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to smell, even though he is stainless.🔽He is not attached to taste, even though he is without taste.

original: reg med pa'ang reg la chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg med pa'ang reg la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to touch, even though he is without touch.

original: chos med pa'ang chos la chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos med pa'ang chos la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to mental objects, even though he is without mental objects.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the eye consciousness, even though he is without eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the ear consciousness, even though he is without ear consciousness.🔽He is not attached to the nose consciousness, even though he is without nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the tongue consciousness, even though he is without tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the body consciousness, even though he is without body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the mind consciousness, even though he is without mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa @124b med do //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa @124b med do // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the eye is not attachment to the sensory contact of the eye.🔽The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the ear is not attachment to the sensory contact of the ear.🔽The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the nose is not attachment to the sensory contact of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the tongue is not attachment to the sensory contact of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the body is not attachment to the sensory contact of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the sensory contact of the mind is not attachment to the sensory contact of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do /
translated: The nonexistence of the sensation arisen from the sensory contact of the eye is not attachment to the sensation arisen from the sensory contact of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of ear, sound, and the consciousness of ear is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of ear, sound, and the consciousness of ear.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of nose is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of nose, smell, and the consciousness of nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of tongue, taste, and the consciousness of tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of body, touch, and the consciousness of body is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of body, touch, and the consciousness of body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of feelings that arise from the union of mind, phenomena, and the consciousness of mind is not attached to feelings that arise from the union of mind, phenomena, and the consciousness of mind.

original: sa'i khams med pa'ang sa'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sa'i khams med pa'ang sa'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The nonexistence of the earth element is not attached to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams med pa'ang chu'i khams @125a *//
analyzed: chu'i khams med pa'ang chu'i khams @125a *//
translated: The water element is not nonexistent.🔽

original: la chags pa med do //
analyzed: la chags pa med do //
translated: The water element does not exist, and there is no attachment to the water element.

original: me'i khams med pa'ang me'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams med pa'ang me'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The fire element does not exist, and there is no attachment to the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams med pa'ang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams med pa'ang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The wind element does not exist, and there is no attachment to the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams med pa'ang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The space element does not exist, and there is no attachment to the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do //
translated: The consciousness element does not exist, and there is no attachment to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa med pa'ang ma rig pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa med pa'ang ma rig pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Ignorance does not exist, and there is no attachment to ignorance.

original: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do //
translated: Formations do not exist, and there is no attachment to formations.

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Consciousness does not exist, and there is no attachment to consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs med pa'ang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs med pa'ang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do //
translated: Name and form do not exist, and there is no attachment to name and form.

original: skye mched drug med pa'ang skye mched drug la chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug med pa'ang skye mched drug la chags pa med do //
translated: The six sense sources do not exist, and there is no attachment to the six sense sources.

original: reg pa med pa'ang reg pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa med pa'ang reg pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Contact does not exist, and there is no attachment to contact.

original: tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-feeling is also not attached to feeling.

original: sred pa med pa'ang sred pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sred pa med pa'ang sred pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-craving is also not attached to craving.

original: len pa med pa'ang len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: len pa med pa'ang len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-grasping is also not attached to grasping.

original: srid pa med pa'ang srid pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa med pa'ang srid pa la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-becoming is also not attached to becoming.

original: skye ba med pa'ang skye ba la chags pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'ang skye ba la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-birth is also not attached to birth.

original: rga shi med pa'ang rga shi la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi med pa'ang rga shi la chags pa med do //
translated: Non-aging and death is also not attached to aging and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The non-perfection of giving is also not attached to the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bzod pa'i pha @125b rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bzod pa'i pha @125b rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The non-perfection of morality is also not attached to the perfection of morality.🔽The non-perfection of patience is also not attached to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The non-perfection of effort is also not attached to the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability is not attached to the perfection of meditative stability,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is not attached to the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: inner emptiness is not attached to inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: outer emptiness is not attached to outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: inner and outer emptiness is not attached to inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is not attached to the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: great emptiness is not attached to great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality is not attached to the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned does not attach to the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned does not attach to the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits does not attach to the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless does not attach to the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded does not attach to the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid @126a *//
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid @126a *//
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence

original: med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: does not attach to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena does not attach to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of defining characteristics does not exist and there is no attachment to the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of nonobservation does not exist and there is no attachment to the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of nonthings does not exist and there is no attachment to the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of essential nature does not exist and there is no attachment to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings does not exist and there is no attachment to the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness do not exist and there is no attachment to the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do /
translated: The right efforts do not exist and there is no attachment to the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do /
translated: The bases of psychic power do not cling to the bases of psychic power.

original: dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The faculties do not cling to the faculties.

original: stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The powers do not cling to the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The branches of enlightenment do not cling to the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The noble eightfold path does not cling to the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags @126b pa'i bden pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags @126b pa'i bden pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The noble truths do not cling to the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The meditative concentrations do not cling to the meditative concentrations.

original: tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The immeasurables do not cling to the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The formless absorptions do not cling to the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the liberations is not attached to the liberations.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the serial absorptions is not attached to the serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation is not attached to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the higher knowledges is not attached to the higher knowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the meditative stabilities is not attached to the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo med pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the dhāraṇī gateways is not attached to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the powers of the tathāgatas is not attached to the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of fear is also not attached to the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do //🔽byams pa chen po med @127a *//
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do // byams pa chen po med @127a *//
translated: The absence of the correct and discerning awarenesses is also not attached to the correct and discerning awarenesses.

original: pa'ang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do //
analyzed: pa'ang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of great love is also not attached to great love.

original: snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of great compassion is also not attached to great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the distinct attributes of a buddha is also not attached to the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of all things is also not attached to the knowledge of all things.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of the aspects of the path is also not attached to the knowledge of the aspects of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do //
translated: The absence of the knowledge of all aspects is also not attached to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord: So it is, Shariputra.🔽The Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in this manner in the perfection of wisdom, with a thought which is not joined to any dharma, does not review the thought which is not joined.🔽And why? Because that thought which is not joined is not a thought.🔽And why? Because that thought which is not joined is not a thought.🔽The thought which is not joined is not a thought.

translated: The thought which is not joined is not

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis @127b bka' stsal pa /

translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: gang po / khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /

original: gang pos gsol pa /
analyzed: gang pos gsol pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te /
analyzed: de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te /
translated: that is a being who has donned the great armor.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la /
analyzed: de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la /

analyzed: de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o //
