original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bus /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaṇī­putra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po /

original: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya /

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Here, a bodhisattva great being

analyzed: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi /

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, he practices the perfection of generosity

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: and gives a gift.

original: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /
translated: For the sake of a few sentient beings,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: he does not stand in the perfection of morality

original: tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi /
translated: and does not guard morality.🔽For the sake of all sentient beings, he practices the perfection of morality

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //
translated: and guards morality.

original: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: For the sake of a few sentient beings,🔽he does not stand in the perfection of patience

original: bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: and does not cultivate patience.

original: @128a *// sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom mo //🔽sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: @128a *// sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom mo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, they practice the perfection of patience and cultivate patience.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not abide in the perfection of effort and make effort for the sake of a few sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo //🔽sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /🔽bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, they practice the perfection of effort and make effort.

original: bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not abide in the perfection of concentration and generate concentration for the sake of a few sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan skyed do //🔽sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan skyed do // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, they practice the perfection of concentration and generate concentration.

original: shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not abide in the perfection of wisdom and cultivate wisdom for the sake of a few sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, I will practice the perfection of wisdom and cultivate wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva does not don the armor with the thought, ‘I will lead this many sentient beings to final nirvāṇa in the element of nirvāṇa that has no remainder of the aggregates,’

original: sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe'am /
analyzed: sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe'am /
translated: ‘I will not lead this many sentient beings to final nirvāṇa,’

original: sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: ‘I will establish this many sentient beings in enlightenment,’

original: sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpags pas go cha mi gyon gyi /
analyzed: sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpags pas go cha mi gyon gyi /
translated: or ‘I will not establish this many sentient beings in enlightenment.’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems @128b can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems @128b can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva dons the great armor for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks,

original: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: ‘I must complete the perfection of generosity.

original: sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will also establish all sentient beings in the perfection of generosity.

original: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will also perfect the perfection of morality.

original: sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will also establish all sentient beings in the perfection of morality.

original: bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will also perfect the perfection of patience.

original: sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will also establish all sentient beings in the perfection of patience.

original: bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will also perfect the perfection of effort.

original: sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will also establish all sentient beings in the perfection of effort.

original: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I will also perfect the perfection of concentration.

original: sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to the perfection of meditative stability.

original: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must perfect the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must perfect inner emptiness.

original: sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to inner emptiness.

original: bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must perfect outer emptiness.

original: sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to outer emptiness.

original: bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must perfect inner and outer emptiness.

original: sems @129a *// can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems @129a *// can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to inner and outer emptiness.

original: bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the emptiness of emptiness.

original: sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the great emptiness.

original: sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all living beings to the great emptiness.

original: bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all living beings to the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the emptiness of the compounded.

original: sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all living beings to the emptiness of the compounded.

original: bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all living beings to the emptiness of the uncompounded.

original: bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I too should complete the emptiness of what is not discarded.

original: sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I too should connect all sentient beings to the emptiness of what is not discarded.

original: bdag gis @129b kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis @129b kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to the emptiness of defining characteristics.

analyzed: bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must apply all sentient beings to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

analyzed: bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o // sems can thams cad kyang yang @130a *//

analyzed: dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I too should apply all sentient beings to the five powers.

analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I too should abide in the seven limbs of awakening.

original: sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I too should abide in the four noble truths.

original: sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I too should apply all sentient beings to the four noble truths.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I too should abide in the meditative stabilities.

original: sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o /
translated: I too should apply all sentient beings to the meditative stabilities.

original: bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i @130b snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i @130b snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang rnam par thar ba brgyad la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam par thar ba brgyad la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I will also abide in the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I should abide in the meditative stabilizations.

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I should establish all sentient beings in the meditative stabilizations.

original: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar @131a *//
translated: I will establish all sentient beings in the four fearlessnesses.

analyzed: bar bya'o // bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will establish all sentient beings in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: bdag kyang byams pa chen po la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang byams pa chen po la gnas par bya'o //

original: sems can thams cad kyang byams pa chen po la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang byams pa chen po la sbyar bar bya'o //

original: bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I will abide in great compassion.

original: sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will establish all sentient beings in great compassion.

analyzed: bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I will establish all sentient beings in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //
translated: I arouse the mind of enlightenment.🔽🔽

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Just that is called the great armor of the bodhisattva great being.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag /
analyzed: sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag /
translated: whatever gifts they give

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste /
translated: but are given with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa bas de 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa bas de 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: They also make those wholesome roots common to all beings

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: and dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @131b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @131b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽and

analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of generosity of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who gives gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: when bodhisattva mahāsattvas give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: and do not dedicate them to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas, this is the armor of the perfection of morality of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom and gives gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: when bodhisattva mahāsattvas give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and do not dedicate them to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas,

original: chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This acceptance, faith, and reliance on those dharmas is the armor of the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom and giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings give gifts,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /🔽sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha @132a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha @132a *//
translated: they do not let their effort slacken with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of effort of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom and giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /🔽'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe / 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing /
translated: Moreover, when a bodhisattva great being is practicing generosity,

original: de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir /
translated: they should be one-pointed in mind,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: and because of that they should not give rise to the thought of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.🔽This is the armor of the perfection of concentration of a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: while practicing generosity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: furthermore, when a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
translated: is practicing generosity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te /🔽des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te / des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: “With attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, the perception of all phenomena as created by a magician is present to them.🔽They do not apprehend a gift,

original: gtong ba'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: gtong ba'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a giver,

original: len pa'ang mi dmigs pa 'di ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: len pa'ang mi dmigs pa 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: and they do not apprehend a recipient.

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste /
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom and giving a gift.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang @132b ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang @132b ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects

original: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
translated: do not take those perfections as a causal sign and do not apprehend them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have donned the great armor are practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de /
translated: with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, give gifts

original: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: that they share in common with all sentient beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, using a dedication formula that does not apprehend anything. This is the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, practice the perfection of morality,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang mos pa mi skyed na /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang mos pa mi skyed na /
translated: they do not even aspire to the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels,

original: so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni /
analyzed: so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni /
translated: let alone the level of ordinary people.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad @133a *//
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad @133a *//
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: Moreover, when bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, practice the perfection of morality,

original: chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This acceptance, faith, and reliance on those dharmas is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /🔽brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: Furthermore, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: without letting their effort decline is the perfection of effort of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when a bodhisattva great being, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, practices and dwells in the perfection of morality,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: he does not open the door to the thought of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and he makes that wholesome root common to all sentient beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and he dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration of a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @133b dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @133b dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: Furthermore, a bodhisattva great being, not with attention connected with the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When practicing the perfection of morality with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /
analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing /
translated: the perception of all phenomena as created by a magician is present,

original: tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de /
analyzed: tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de /
translated: and they do not falsely project that morality.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: tshul khrims de'ang mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: tshul khrims de'ang mi dmigs shing /
translated: that morality is not apprehended,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: and they make common cause with all sentient beings with that wholesome root.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: They dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, when a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of morality in this way,

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te /
translated: he embraces all six perfections.

analyzed: de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, he is called ‘one who has donned the great armor.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste /

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /

translated: and dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

translated: This is

translated: This is the perfection of generosity of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of patience.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //

analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi 'phrogs te /
translated: They are not carried away by the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions.

analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o //
translated: They are not reborn due to the power of the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, and the formless absorptions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong pas mnyam par gzhog ste /

translated: “Moreover, bodhisattva great beings see the concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions as empty, and they enter them by seeing them as empty, signless, and wishless.

original: de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye /
translated: They do not take birth through their power,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do /
translated: and they do not actualize the very limit of reality.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to //

analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /

analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He has attained and abides in the sphere of infinite space.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He has completely transcended the sphere of infinite space.🔽He is aware of the sphere of infinite consciousness as infinite consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He has attained and abides in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: He has completely transcended the sphere of infinite consciousness.🔽He is aware of the sphere of nothing whatsoever as nothing whatsoever.

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He has attained and abides in the sphere of nothing whatsoever.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They transcend the sphere of nothing-whatsoever,🔽and they abide in the sphere of neither-perception-nor-non-perception,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

analyzed: de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /

analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /
translated: His mind becomes one-pointed.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa /

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas /

translated: He becomes free from attachment to joy and

translated: mind of equanimity that is free from reference points.🔽He fills the ten directions, as vast as the realm of space,🔽with a vast, expansive,🔽nondual,🔽immeasurable,🔽unbiased,🔽harmless,🔽unrivaled,🔽and completely perfected

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas /
translated: mind of equanimity that is free from reference points.🔽He fills the ten directions, as vast as the realm of space,🔽with a vast, expansive,🔽nondual,🔽immeasurable,🔽unbiased,🔽harmless,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: unrivaled,🔽and completely perfected🔽mind of equanimity that is free from reference points.🔽He fills the ten directions, as vast as the realm of space,🔽with a vast, expansive,🔽nondual,🔽immeasurable,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: unbiased,

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: harmless,🔽unrival

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “Consciousness is infinite” and so he achieves and remains in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /🔽cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te / cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: “In every way, the sphere of infinite consciousness is transcended” and so he achieves and remains in the sphere of nothingness.🔽“In every way, the sphere of nothingness is transcended” and so he achieves and remains in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “In every way, the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is transcended” and so he achieves and remains in the cessation of perception and feeling.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
translated: This, Śāriputra, is the bodhisattva great beings’ meditative stabilization.

original: nam @145a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: nam @145a *// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva, having entered into and emerged from these meditative stabilities, the immeasurables, and the formless [absorptions], dedicates them all to omniscience,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s perfection of morality.

original: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “While practicing the perfection of patience,

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /
translated: he is secluded from sense objects,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: secluded from unwholesome states,

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: with thought and examination,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and joy and happiness born of seclusion, he achieves and remains in the first concentration.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: he becomes inwardly clear and pure.

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /🔽rnam par rtog pa med pa /🔽rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas / rnam par rtog pa med pa / rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
translated: With a mind that is unified,

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: he abides in the second concentration, which is free of conceptualization and analysis, and is born of single-pointed concentration, joy, and bliss.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /🔽bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te / bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: “ Free of attachment to joy, he abides with mindfulness and introspection in a state of equanimity.

original: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
translated: He experiences bliss with his body, and the noble ones declare that he abides in mindfulness and equanimity, experiencing bliss.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum @145b pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum @145b pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: He abides in the third concentration, which is free of joy.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “ He abandons bliss,

original: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
translated: abandons suffering,

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
translated: and previously abandons both joy and mental unease.

original: bde ba'ang med /🔽sdug bsngal yang med pa /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med / sdug bsngal yang med pa /
translated: It is neither happy nor unhappy.🔽It is equanimity and mindfulness.

original: btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: “He accomplishes and abides in the fourth concentration.

original: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /🔽mi gnyis pa /🔽tshad med pa /🔽gcugs med pa /
analyzed: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa / mi gnyis pa / tshad med pa / gcugs med pa /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with love that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

original: gnod pa med pa /🔽ltod pa med pa /🔽yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa / ltod pa med pa / yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with compassion that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.🔽“He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with joy that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

original: shin tu bsgoms pas /🔽'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /🔽nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas / 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa / nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with equanimity that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

original: mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do //
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with the sphere of infinite space that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

original: de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa /🔽mi gnyis pa /🔽tshad med pa /🔽gcugs med pa /
analyzed: de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa / mi gnyis pa / tshad med pa / gcugs med pa /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with the sphere of infinite consciousness that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

analyzed: gnod pa med pa / ltod pa med pa / yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with the sphere of infinite nothingness that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.🔽“He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

original: shin tu bsgoms pas /🔽'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas /🔽'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: “He fills, pervades, and is saturated with a mind endowed with the sphere of infinite space that is vast, exalted, measureless, and without enmity, without ill will, without rivalry, without contention, and well cultivated.

analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /

analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /

analyzed: mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do //
translated: They are intent on them and experience them.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: In every way they transcend the perception of form.

original: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
analyzed: thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
translated: The perception of obstruction disappears.

original: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perception of variety. They think, ‘Space is infinite,’

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and they achieve and remain in the sphere of infinite space.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: In every way they transcend the sphere of infinite space.

original: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They think, ‘Consciousness is infinite,’ and they achieve and remain in the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: In every way they transcend the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They think, ‘There is nothing at all,’ and they achieve and remain in the sphere of nothing whatsoever.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They transcend the sphere of nothing-at-all,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and they attain the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, and abide in it, without apprehending anything.

original: @146b 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
analyzed: @146b 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ concentration.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings, in these concentrations, these immeasurables, and these formless [absorptions], rest in meditation with the aspects, the ways, and the signs of space,

original: rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and when they rise from that, they dedicate it to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of patience.

original: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: Practicing the perfection of perseverance,

original: 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: 'dod pas dben /
translated: they are free from desire,

original: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa /🔽rtog pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /
translated: It is free from negative and non-virtuous attributes.

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: It is accompanied by discernment and investigation.🔽It is accompanied by joy and bliss.

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: This is the first meditative concentration, which is accomplished and abides.🔽When discernment and investigation have been pacified,

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
translated: the mind becomes completely clear within.

original: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /🔽rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas / rnam par rtog pa med pa /
translated: The mind becomes a single continuum.

original: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
translated: It is free from discernment and investigation.🔽It is accompanied by joy and bliss.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: This is the second meditative concentration, which is accomplished and abides.

original: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: When one is free from attachment to joy,

original: shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te /🔽bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te / bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa /
translated: one abides with mindfulness and introspection in a state of equanimity.

original: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa /
analyzed: bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa /
translated: One experiences bliss with the body, and the noble ones declare this to be mindfulness that is “experiencing bliss. ”🔽It is discernment that is “experiencing bliss. ”

original: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /🔽dga' ba med pa'i @147a *//
analyzed: btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste / dga' ba med pa'i @147a *//
translated: It is called equanimity.🔽In the third meditative concentration,🔽he abides in equanimity,

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: having attained the meditative concentration that is free from joy.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: He has abandoned pleasure,

original: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
translated: abandoned pain,

original: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas /
translated: and previously abandoned mental satisfaction and mental dissatisfaction.

original: bde ba'ang med /🔽sdug bsngal yang med pa /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med / sdug bsngal yang med pa /

original: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: They think, “There is nothing at all,” and they achieve and remain in the sphere of nothing at all.

original: de rnam pa thams @149b cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams @149b cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They completely transcend the sphere of nothing-at-all,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and they settle in the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, without apprehending anything.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ concentration.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings, in these concentrations, these immeasurables, and these formless [absorptions], settle in evenness with the aspects, the ways, and the signs of space,

original: rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and when they rise from that, they dedicate it to the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of concentration.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: 'dod pas dben /

analyzed: sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa / rtog pa dang bcas pa /

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: This is the first meditative concentration, which he accomplishes and abides in.

analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste /

original: mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do //
analyzed: mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do //

original: de 'dod pas dben /
analyzed: de 'dod pas dben /

original: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bcas pa /

analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: and with joy and bliss born of seclusion. They accomplish and maintain the first meditative concentration.

original: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /
analyzed: de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste /

analyzed: sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas /

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa /

original: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa med pa /
translated: without analysis,

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //🔽de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas @152a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so // de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas @152a *//
translated: he attains and dwells in the second concentration, which is accompanied by the joy and bliss born of samādhi.🔽“Free from desire, he is mindful, with equanimity, and experiences pleasure with his body.🔽The noble ones declare that he has attained and dwells in the third concentration, which is without joy.

original: te // bde ba lus kyis myong la /🔽'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /

translated: “Free from desire, he is mindful, with equanimity, and experiences pleasure with his body.

original: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: The noble ones declare that he has attained and dwells in the fourth concentration, which is accompanied by neither suffering nor pleasure and includes purification of mindfulness through equanimity.

original: de bde ba'ang spangs /
analyzed: de bde ba'ang spangs /
translated: “He abandons pleasure,🔽abandons suffering,

original: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /
translated: and

analyzed: yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas / bde ba'ang med /

analyzed: sdug bsngal yang med pa /

analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They completely transcend the sphere of infinite consciousness and

analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te /
translated: They completely transcend the sphere of nothingness and

analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med @152b min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //

analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te /

analyzed: de dag gi nga ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

translated: whether of the śrāvakas or

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
