original: smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang /
translated: It is to cultivate the absence of wishes. It is to cultivate the superknowledges in all their aspects. It is to cultivate the meditative stabilities in all their aspects. It is to cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways in all their aspects. It is to cultivate the powers of the thus-gone ones in all their aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa @154b dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa @154b dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang /
translated: It is to cultivate the fearlessnesses in all their aspects. It is to cultivate the correct understandings in all their aspects. It is to cultivate great love in all its aspects. It is to cultivate great compassion in all its aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste /
translated: the cultivation of all the aspects of the Buddhadharmas, the cultivation of all the aspects of the knowledge of all modes, the cultivation of all the aspects of the knowledge of paths, and the cultivation of all the aspects of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: further, the bodhisattva great beings, while resting in the meditative stabilization of love,

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do //
translated: direct themselves to the thought, “I must protect all beings.”

original: snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: While resting in the meditative stabilization of compassion,

original: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do //
translated: He is compassionate and loving toward sentient beings.

original: dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: He enters into the meditative absorption of joy

original: bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so //
translated: and thinks about sentient beings, thinking, “I will liberate them.”

original: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: He enters into the meditative absorption of equanimity

original: sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de /
translated: and is dedicated to the exhaustion of the defilements of sentient beings.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam @155a *//
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam @155a *//
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings enter into the aspects, modes, and signs of the meditative concentrations and the immeasurables,

original: par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /
analyzed: par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang /
translated: and rise from them,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par /
translated: except for dedicating them to omniscience,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: not dedicating to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables, without decline.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing /🔽sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions without mixing them up,🔽and do not give rise to a desire for the two levels,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi /
translated: the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni /
translated: but are devoted to and delight in the knowledge of all aspects,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings, with the mind of awakening endowed with omniscience,

original: mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du /🔽brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du / brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni /
translated: do not give up striving in order to abandon nonvirtuous qualities and perfect virtuous qualities,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of diligence of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i @155b snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i @155b snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog la /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings rest in equipoise in these concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /
translated: but do not take birth due to the power of the concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la /
analyzed: de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la /
translated: and do not experience their taste,

original: de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: They are not carried away by them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of meditative stabilization of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la /
translated: enter into and rise from those meditative stabilizations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /
analyzed: de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang /
translated: and they contemplate them as having the aspects of impermanence, suffering, no-self, peace, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: not entering into the flawlessness of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @156a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni / nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis @156a *//
translated: moreover, the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings🔽is the knowledge of inner emptiness but not by way of apprehending;

original: ma yin / phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: ma yin / phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: the knowledge of outer emptiness but not by way of apprehending;

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: the knowledge of inner and outer emptiness but not by way of apprehending;

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: the knowledge of the emptiness of emptiness but not by way of apprehending;

original: chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of the great, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of the ultimate, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.🔽They know the emptiness of the conditioned, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of the unconditioned, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.🔽They know the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.🔽They know the emptiness of what is neither with nor without origination, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of what is not to be discarded, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of inherent existence, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of all phenomena, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of defining attributes, but not in a way that involves apprehending something.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of nonapprehension, but not by apprehending it.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They know the emptiness of nonthings, but not by apprehending it.🔽They know the emptiness of essence, but not by apprehending it.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste /
translated: They know the emptiness of the essence of nonthings, but not by apprehending it.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang @156b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang @156b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: furthermore, the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings is

original: chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of the mind remaining undisturbed and in equipoise with regard to all phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: “Moreover, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is permanent,

original: mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is impermanent, the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is happiness,

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is suffering, the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is a self,

original: bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /🔽mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is not a self, the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is attractive,🔽the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is repulsive, the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is empty,

original: mi stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: mi stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it is not empty, the non-engagement of cognition in the notion that it has marks,

original: mtshan ma med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug /
analyzed: mtshan ma med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug /
translated: they do not engage in the cognition that it is signless,

original: smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: and they do not engage in the cognition that it is wishless.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that they do not apprehend anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is also

original: gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: not engaged in cognition of the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /
translated: not engaged in cognition of the future,

original: da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /🔽'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi @157a *//
analyzed: da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi @157a *//
translated: and not engaged in cognition of the present.🔽In this regard, there is no cognition of the past, future, or present,

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi shes pa yang med pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi shes pa yang med pa ste /
translated: in that the past, future, and present are non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it does not apprehend anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is also

original: gang 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
analyzed: gang 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
translated: not something that engages with the desire realm,

original: gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la /
analyzed: gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la /
translated: not something that engages with the form realm, and not something that engages with the formless realm.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste /
translated: It is not something that does not know the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it does not apprehend anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is also

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
translated: He does not engage his mind in worldly dharmas.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang /
translated: He does not engage his mind in supramundane dharmas, or in dharmas with outflows or without outflows, or in compounded dharmas or uncompounded dharmas.

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med /
translated: But he is not ignorant of mundane or supramundane dharmas.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste /
translated: He is not ignorant of dharmas with outflows or without outflows, or of compounded or uncompounded dharmas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @157b chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @157b chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: this too is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings, in that it is not apprehended.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po /
translated: Śāradvatīputra then asked, “Venerable Pūrṇa,

original: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya /
translated: when does it say that the bodhisattva great beings are established in the Great Vehicle?”

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: Pūrṇa replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this regard, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
translated: they abide in the transcendent perfection of generosity,

original: des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: but they do not apprehend generosity,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend the transcendent perfection of generosity, they do not apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: len pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: len pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: they do not apprehend a recipient,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /🔽de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: and they do not apprehend those mental states.🔽In this way, great bodhisattva beings,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: through the medium of non-apprehension, are said to ‘abide in the transcendent perfection of generosity.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this regard, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
translated: “They are also established in the perfection of morality,

original: des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs /
translated: but they do not apprehend morality,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the perfection of morality,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: nor do they apprehend those mental activities.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: In that way, it is said that bodhisattva great beings are established in the perfection of morality by way of not apprehending anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /🔽des bzod @158a *//
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod @158a *//
translated: are established in the perfection of patience,

original: pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: but they do not apprehend patience,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the perfection of patience,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: He does not apprehend those mental activities.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, not apprehending anything, is said to be ‘perfectly settled in the perfection of patience.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
translated: are perfectly settled in the perfection of perseverance.

original: des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs /
translated: They do not apprehend perseverance,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the perfection of perseverance,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: nor do they apprehend those mental activities.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, Subhūti, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, not apprehending anything, is said to be ‘perfectly settled in the perfection of perseverance.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this regard, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
translated: they abide in the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,

original: des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs /
translated: but they do not apprehend meditative concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: nor do they apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: nor do they apprehend those mental states.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o /
translated: In this way, great bodhisattva beings are said to abide in the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, without apprehending anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatī­putra,

original: 'di la byang chub sems @158b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems @158b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in this regard, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang /
translated: they abide in the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: des dge pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: des dge pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs /
translated: He does not apprehend wholesome dharmas,

original: mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs /
translated: he does not apprehend unwholesome dharmas, he does not apprehend mundane dharmas, he does not apprehend supramundane dharmas, he does not apprehend compounded dharmas, he does not apprehend uncompounded dharmas, he does not apprehend dharmas with outflows, he does not apprehend dharmas without outflows, he does not apprehend wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs /
translated: he does not apprehend the perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs /
translated: he does not apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te /
translated: he does not apprehend those mental activities.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: In that way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva is said to stand in the perfection of wisdom by way of not apprehending anything.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo //
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, with a mind endowed with the knowledge of all aspects, for the sake of cultivating and fully cultivating the meditation, meditates on the emptiness of internal phenomena without apprehending anything.
